name: Notice of Proceedings: Solicitor service inside UK (NOP ASE2)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant: ((applicant name))
Respondent: ((respondent name))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name)),

This ((union type)) application has been checked by court staff. It's now ready for you to serve on the respondent. 

#What you need to do 
Download the following documents from the 'documents' section of this case: 

* The ((union type)) application
* Notice of Proceedings 
* AOS form (D10) 

Print all documents in order to effect service. Once you have served the respondent you must 'confirm service'. You will be able to upload a 'certificate of service'.   

Download the documents and confirm service in your HMCTS account: ((signin url))

Please note that Rule 6.6A and 6.41A set out the time for serving an application by the applicant. The required step in relation to the method of service chosen must be completed before midnight on the day 28 days after the date of issue of the application.

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)
subject: Application checked and ready to be served: ((reference number))
